title: Git Version Error in Training
body:
## Environment
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

 - OS: Windows 10
 - GPU: 1050 ti
 - Python: 3.7

## libraries info - 
	matplotlib==3.2.1
	numpy==1.18.3
	opencv-python==4.2.0.34
	Pillow==7.1.2
	protobuf==3.11.3
	tensorboard==2.2.1
	tensorboard-plugin-wit==1.6.0.post3
	torch==1.5.0+cu101
	torchvision==0.6.0+cu101
	tqdm==4.45.0

Git repo was downloaded from the github ( 692f945 ). 

Trying to train the model on a single class. I am running the code

	>> (yolo_2) C:\Users\SR\yolov3>python train.py --data data\coco1cls.data --cfg cfg\yolov3-tiny-1cls.cfg

Output

	Apex recommended for faster mixed precision training: https://github.com/NVIDIA/apex
	-d was unexpected at this time.
	Traceback (most recent call last):
	  File "train.py", line 408, in <module>
	    check_git_status()
	  File "C:\Users\SR\yolov3\utils\utils.py", line 37, in check_git_status
	    s = subprocess.check_output('if [ -d .git ]; then git fetch && git status -uno; fi', shell=True).decode('utf-8')
	  File "C:\Users\SR\.conda\envs\yolo_2\lib\subprocess.py", line 411, in check_output
	    **kwargs).stdout
	  File "C:\Users\SR\.conda\envs\yolo_2\lib\subprocess.py", line 512, in run
	    output=stdout, stderr=stderr)
	subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command 'if [ -d .git ]; then git fetch && git status -uno; fi' returned non-zero exit status 1.
